title: Introduction to Hypnotherapy for Better Sleep
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Better Sleep audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Better Sleep audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.

title: Unwinding After a Busy Day
body:
This Unwinding After A Busy Day meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need help relaxing and releasing tension after a busy day. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. After a hectic or stressful, long hard day at home or at work, the first and most important thing you need to do is relax. If you find it hard to unwind then your stress will carry over to the next day and your mind will get into the routine of  being in this heightened state of stress which will ultimately start to affect your state of mind, decision making, sleep and health. This session will help you relieve some of the pressures and tensions that may have been building up throughout the day, so you can release any stress, slow your mind and wind down.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you can feel instantly calm and relaxed and start the next day feeling refreshed.
teaser: This Unwinding After A Busy Day meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need help relaxing and releasing tension after a busy day.

title: Anxiety Release
body:
This Anxiety Release guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who might be feeling anxious, overwhelmed, out of control or fearful.
Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  When a person is anxious, they are normally worried about something that might happen in the future.  So, anxiety is often problem solving and worrying about something that might not even happen. Anxiety is a response in your body to make you alert, prepared and ready to act for your benefit. But sometimes it doesn’t work for your benefit as your anxious thoughts can overwhelm you making you feel out of control and fearful.  In our session we will teach you some breathing exercises to help you remain calm and in control and replace those feelings of anxiety with feelings of calmness.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you feel much more in control and less anxious.
teaser: This Anxiety Release guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who might be feeling anxious, overwhelmed, out of control or fearful.

title: Releasing Stress
body:
This Releasing Stress guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to feel less stressed.  

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Stress can come from many different aspects of your day to day life - such as an increased workload, an argument you have had with a partner, friend or family, existing financial worries or just day to day worries.  During these situations you may feel threatened or upset so that your body creates a stress response, this in turn can cause a variety of physical symptoms, changing the way you behave, think and act.  In this session we will help you take control back, releasing any feelings of stress so you are ready to embrace each day with a fresh, positive mind.  Feeling calm and relaxed, recognising that stress no longer serves you. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to help you manage your stress levels.
teaser: This Releasing Stress guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to feel less stressed.

title: Falling Asleep
body:
This Falling Asleep guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who struggle to fall asleep and stay asleep.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. It can be incredibly frustrating not being able to fall asleep or stay asleep and this in turn can have a big impact on your memory, mood, relationships, performance and physical health. In this session we will teach you some breathing techniques to quiet the mind, letting go of worries or anxieties to help sleep come more naturally for you. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to help you fall asleep and stay asleep more easily. We also recommend you listen to our Better Sleep for Adults session to help get a more restful night’s sleep.
teaser: This Falling Asleep guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who struggle to fall asleep and stay asleep.

title: Better Sleep for Children
body:
This Better Sleep for Children guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is for children who struggle to get to sleep at night, wake in the night or suffer from bad dreams.  

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. This session is recommended for children age 7+ and is only 15 minutes long. The audio will help your child not only feel more relaxed, safe and protected in their beds, but will also stop any negative or unwanted thoughts. We do this by unlocking their imagination and exploring their creativity in their dreams, leading to them feeling more excited about going to bed at night.  Your child can listen to this audio as many times as they like, day or night, until they no longer need to - this will help compound the positive messaging, override their old beliefs and help the mind create new neural pathways to ensuring they sleep better at night.
teaser: This Better Sleep for Children guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is for children who struggle to get to sleep at night, wake in the night or suffer from bad dreams.

title: Better Sleep for Adults
body:
This Better Sleep guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need help getting a more restful night's sleep.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Not getting a good night's sleep can be caused by many factor such as stress, worry, anxiety, depression, having a medical condition, taking certain medications, as well as other factors such as a noisy environment, extreme temperatures, jet lag, shift work, going through the menopause and misuse of alcohol, caffeine and other substances. In this session we will help you set some good sleep hygiene rules around your lifestyle, help you let go of worries and anxiety before bed and create the perfect sleep zone. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to getting a more restful night's sleep.
teaser: This Better Sleep guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need help getting a more restful night's sleep.

title: Increase in Exercise
body:
Developing and maintaining regular physical activity is essential for good health and happiness.  However, we often find it hard to maintain an exercise plan if we do it without discovering our ‘why’, our motivation. Whether your goal is to feel better, lose weight, get stronger, or to live a healthier life, staying on the right path takes consciousness and effort. 

Our session will help you to be committed to your exercise goals through changing thinking patterns and behavior. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you’re much more motivated to exercise more. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: Our session will help you to be committed to your exercise goals through changing thinking patterns and behavior.
